meanings.definition: Focused or centered on men to the exclusion of women.
meanings.sent1: The androcentric viewpoint dominated the discussion, leaving no room for women's perspectives.
meanings.sent2: The androcentric society prioritized men's needs over women's.
meanings.sent3: It was comical how androcentric the group's decision-making process was, completely ignoring the female members.
meanings.sent4: The androcentric nature of the workplace created a barrier for women to advance in their careers.
meanings.sent5: The androcentric culture in the organization was so ingrained that it was challenging for women to be heard.

meanings.definition: Reflecting or regarding men as superior or more important than women.
meanings.sent1: Her androcentric views made her believe that men were inherently better leaders than women.
meanings.sent2: The androcentric beliefs in the community led to unequal opportunities for women.
meanings.sent3: It seemed absurd how androcentric his opinions were, dismissing the capabilities of women.
meanings.sent4: The androcentric mindset in the industry hindered progress towards gender equality.
meanings.sent5: The androcentric attitude of the professor was evident in his biased treatment towards male students.
